name: edges
description: Data Query and Visualisation Lifecycle Suite

scripts.build-all: npm run build-client && npm run build-module && npm run build-es1x
scripts.build-client: npm run jquery-external && npm run es-external && npm run clean-client && npm run target-client
scripts.build-module: npm run jquery-bundled && npm run es-external && npm run clean-module && npm run target-module
scripts.build-es1x: npm run clean-es1x && npm run target-es1x
scripts.build-styles: npm run clean-styles && parcel build --log-level verbose --detailed-report 10 sass/all.scss
scripts.build-demo: npm run jquery-bundled && npm run es1x && npm run clean-demo && npm run target-demo
scripts.client-standalone: npm run build-client && npm run build-es1x && cp ./dist/client/* views/standalone && cp ./dist/es1x/* views/standalone && cp ./vendor/jquery-3.6.0/jquery-3.6.0.min.js views/standalone
scripts.demo-standalone: npm run build-demo && cp ./dist/demo/* views/standalone && cp ./vendor/bootstrap-3.3.1/css/bootstrap.css views/standalone
scripts.demo-serve: npm run jquery-bundled && npm run es1x && npm run clean && parcel serve views/demo.html -p 8000

author: Richard Jones
